author: Michael Warren Davis
title: The Invincible Ignorance of Pandemic-Era Journalists
description:
Here's an expert secret from inside the industry: reporters don't know what the hell they're talking about.
The post The Invincible Ignorance of Pandemic-Era Journalists appeared first on The American Conservative.
content:
